name: Music_789.wav
keywords: ['pop song', 'trumpet', 'tuba', 'bells', 'string section', 'church bells', 'holiday feel', "children's voices", 'moderate tempo', 'scheming music']
caption: This pop song starts with children's voices singing a melody. This is accompanied by a tuba playing the low registers. A string section plays a repetitive staccato phrase. This is followed by a phrase played on a trumpet and a descend run played on bells. The children's voice repeats the first melody once again. In between the sound of church bells is played. This song has a holiday feel. This song can be played in the intro credits of a holiday movie.
